description: Looking for a healthier summertime snack? Try this grilled mango recipe on the barbecue that's topped with a zesty lime yoghurt and macadamia nuts.
keywords: Desserts,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Nikki P,Mango,Dairy free
name: Grilled Mango with Lime Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup macadamia nuts, roughly chopped, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Score mango flesh in a criss-cross pattern. Spray lightly with oil.
Place mango, cut-side down, on grill and cook for 3 minutes or until caramelised.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt and lime zest in a small bowl.
Place mango on serving plates and drizzle with juice. Top with nuts and mint. Serve with yoghurt.
